name: bootprompt
description: Wrappers for JavaScript alert(), confirm() and other flexible dialogs using the Bootstrap framework

scripts.tsc: tsc -p src/tsconfig.json --outDir build/js && echo 'export as namespace bootprompt;' >> build/js/bootprompt.d.ts
scripts.copy: cp -p build/js/*.d.ts package.json README.md LICENSE.md build/dist
scripts.build: npm run tsc && npm run rollup && npm run copy && npm run copy-docs
scripts.copy-docs: cp -rp docs build && cp -rp build/dist/bootprompt.all.min.* build/docs/js
scripts.build-docs: npm run build && npm run copy-docs
scripts.gh-pages: npm run build-docs && mkdir -p build && (cd build; rm -rf gh-pages; git clone .. --branch gh-pages gh-pages) && find build/gh-pages/ -type f \! -path 'build/gh-pages/.git/*' -delete && find build/gh-pages -type d -empty -delete && cp -rp build/docs/* build/gh-pages
scripts.lint: tslint --format verbose -p src/tsconfig.json && tslint --format verbose -p tests/tsconfig.json && eslint *.js
scripts.postversion: npm run build-and-test && npm run self:publish

author: Louis-Dominique Dubeau <ldd@lddubeau.com>
